name: Oneplus Forum Dark
description: A simple dark/blue theme CSS for Oneplus Forum
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://forums.oneplus.net/"), url-prefix("https://account.oneplus.net/") {
body,html
{
background-color:#212121!important;
color:white!important;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #000000
}

.img-wrap,
.sectionMain,
#pageNodeContent,
#header,
#forums,
#header-nav-top.stuck
{
box-shadow: 0px 5px 15px #000000
}


#header-nav-top.stuck,
div#exposeMask,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus,
.nav-tabs>li.active>a,
.bbCodeBlock.bbCodeQuote{
	background:rgba(64,64,64,.8)!important
}

/*.nav-tabs>li.active>a:hover, .nav-tabs>li.active>a:focus*/

.post-vote-button,
.secondaryContent,
.message .messageContent,
.bbCodeQuote .quoteContainer,
.bbCodeQuote .attribution,
.post--analytics,
.card-deck-wrapper,
.post--share,
.form-control,
.forum-toolbar .btn,
.thread--group--header,
.thread--group--header .row,
.thread--group,
.discussionListItem,
.thread--item,
.InlineModForm,
.sectionFooter,
.heading,
.btn,
.prefix.prefixWhite,
.itemPageNav a,
.user-popover .profile-bottom,.bg-paper-gray,#redactor_modal_overlay,
.profilePage .side-blocks,
.profilePage .primaryUserBlock,.profilePage .followBlock,.profilePage .tabs.mainTabs,
.profilePage #ProfilePanes
{
background:none!important;
}

.tab-pane,
.popover-arrow,
#header,
#header-nav-top .row,
#search-bar-an,
.thread-detail .pageNavLinkGroup,
.PageNav a,
.thread-detail-title .titleBar,
.thread-detail .messageList .message,
.messageContent,
footer,
.section.widget-container,
.dropdown-menu,
#pageNodeContent,
.forums-container,
.sectionMain,
.sort-by-header,
.redactor_toolbar,
#forums li.forum,
.xenOverlay,
ul.autoCompleteList,
.textCtrl,
.user-popover, .quick-reply-box,
.primaryContent,
header,footer,
.log-in,.login-box,.retrieve-password,.sign-up,#sticky-tools-btn{
background:rgba(64,64,128,.85)!important;
}

.bbCodeQuote .quoteContainer
{
border:1px solid grey!important
}


.prefix.prefixWhite,
.muted,
.post-date,
.pollBlock .question .questionText,
.bbCodeQuote .attribution,
.input-group .form-control,.signature,.userTitle,
label,.inner,
h3,.sectionFooter,.text-light,.pairsInline dt,.pairsInline dd,
.action-comments,
.text-strong,
.lastThreadTitle,
.lastThreadDate,
.hint,
.heading,
.subHeading,
option,
a,
.title,.publish,.thread--item--text--subtitle,
.explain,
footer .copy-right,.text-gray,.sign-up
{
color: white!important;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #000000;
}

.PageNav a,
.bbCodeBlock.bbCodeQuote
{
border:1px solid grey!important
}
.button:hover, .button[href]:hover, .buttonProxy:hover .button {
    background-color: #940019;
    border-top-color: rgb(64,64,128)!important;
}
}
